MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the PA8 postcode area of Erskine. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to remove a tree from the overhead line network at Erskine Ferry House, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:15am. This may affect the supply to your property. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:30am on 6th February.
